artview.scripts.map_to_grid¶

artview.scripts.map_to_grid(DirIn='./', filename=None, field=None)[source]¶

artview execution to pyart mapping

It has Menu with ComponentsControl, menu is opening radar files

1 radar and 1 grid sharing Vfield

Mapper connected to both displays

grafical start for:
  • All plugins
  • Display
  • ComponentsControl
